desc: This version includes updates to make the menu simpler and easier to use, and minor UX improvements.
notes: - Refreshed main menu with less clutter and a more simplified experience. The daily quiz can now be accessed from the Discover tab, underneath the image description./n- Added icons to menus./n- Added loading notifications so itâ€™s easier to tell if the app gets stuck./n- Added ability to disable the app while a previous wallpaper is set./n- Renamed some dictionary values./n- Clarified parts of the instructions.
